content.text: Match ends, Xerez 3, Girona 1.
Second Half ends, Xerez 3, Girona 1.
Capdevila (Xerez) is shown the yellow card for dangerous play.
Albert Dorca (Girona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Dangerous play by Capdevila (Xerez).
Mario Bermejo (Xerez) hits the bar with a right footed shot from the centre of the box. Assisted by Pablo Redondo.
Attempt blocked. Jandro (Girona) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
